paste.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to stick something to something else using glue
paste.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A notice had been pasted to the door.
paste.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make words that you have removed or copied appear in a new place on a computer screen
paste.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Data can be pasted into word processing documents.
paste.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a soft thick mixture that can easily be shaped or spread
paste.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Mix the powder with enough water to make a smooth paste.
paste.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a type of glue that is used for sticking paper onto things
paste.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: pieces of glass that are used in jewellery to look like valuable stones
paste.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to make words that you have removed or copied appear in a new place on a computer screen
